hero.title: About GrowWise
hero.subtitle: Since 2019, GrowWise has been transforming education in Dublin, CA, through personalized K-12 instruction and innovative STEAM programs. We empower every student with the skills, knowledge, and confidence they need to succeed.

foundation.title: Our Foundation
foundation.subtitle: Everything we do is guided by our core mission, vision, and values that put student success at the center.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded in 2019 in the heart of Dublin, California, GrowWise was born from a simple but powerful vision: every child deserves personalized education that meets them where they are and helps them reach their full potential.
story.p2: What started as a small tutoring center has grown into a comprehensive educational institution serving families throughout the Tri-Valley area. Our founder, Dr. Sarah Chen, recognized that traditional one-size-fits-all education wasn't serving the diverse learning needs of today's students.
story.p3: Today, GrowWise stands as a testament to what's possible when passionate educators combine proven teaching methods with innovative technology and genuine care for each student's success. We've helped over 300 students not just improve their grades, but develop confidence, curiosity, and a lifelong love of learning.

achievements.title: Our Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Numbers that reflect our commitment to student success and educational excellence.

approach.title: Our Educational Approach
approach.subtitle: We believe effective education requires more than delivering content. Our approach is built on four core principles that ensure every student receives the support they need to succeed.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Our passionate educators bring years of experience and genuine care for student success to every lesson.

community.title: Community Impact
community.subtitle: We believe in giving back to the community that supports us, creating opportunities for all students to succeed.
